original: 吳郡富春人，東吳宗室。故太子孫登之子，試圖扳倒孫峻，但風聲走漏，被孫峻所查，被迫自殺。另一說是無意中被捲入爭權，不得已而自殺。
text: A native of Fuchun, Wu Jun, a clan of the Eastern Wu. Therefore, the son of the prince Sun Deng tried to bring down Sun Jun, but the wind leaked and was investigated by Sun Jun and forced to commit suicide. The other is that he was inadvertently involved in a power struggle and committed suicide as a last resort.
